title: (x) Pampers website hand printed script - Andy Bold {Stephen}
content:
hi guys, I wonder if you know what font is this used in titles. If it is a custom work, would you suggest me some similar letters?

thanks in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012165731im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/capturada7.jpg)

 [‹ (x) The Crown Valley Group, Inc. - Basilea {Eric Schmid}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012165731/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19312 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Learn Your Lines ultra black sans - Gotham {Tiff} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012165731/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19313 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mariano

comments.content:
thanks, very much. Now what about the logo?
